actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to encourage drilling and prospecting for oil and natural gas in land not known to be productive of oil and natural gas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to pay to any eligible oil well driller an amount equal to one-half of the intangible drilling and development costs of a nonproductive wildcat oil or natural gas well, not to exceed $25,000 in the case of any one well, in lands not known to be productive of oil and natural gas.

titles.title: A bill to encourage drilling and prospecting for oil and natural gas in land not known to be productive of oil and natural gas.
